util.tools

Class MathUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.tools.MathUtils

  • public final class MathUtils
extends Object
    various mathematics utilities. The functions do not exist in the basic math package Math.*
    Since:
    8 dec. 2008 version 2.0.1
    Version:
    2.0.1
    Author:
    Arnaud Malapert

        public static int combinaison(int n,
